TEXT: An ordinary high school girl who likes Peroro and is good at driving tank. NL She came here after hearing a rumor that there was a huge Peroro at the spire.
NL Your hand points toward the trigger...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Faust.~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
